Champion Select[]

Pick
  • ▶️   Sound Effect
  • ▶️   "Let's light it up!"
Ban
  • ▶️   "But all my light puns would've brightened your day."

  • Elementalist
  • Cosmic
  • Dark Cosmic

Original
Battle Academia
Empyrean
Each of these skins may feature: a voiceover filter; additional quotes and/or interactions. In all other cases, skins use the base skin's audio or version of the audio. Some voicelines may also be disabled while using alternate skins.

Game Start[]

Music upon start of the game
  • ▶️   A stripped-down version of "Burning Bright" plays.

Joke[]

  • ▶️   ▶️   "Double rainbow... what does it mean?"
    • ▶️   ▶️   "Well, a double rainbow is a phenomenon of optics that displays a spectrum of light due to the sun shining on droplets of moisture in the atmosphere. Does that explain it?"
Joke Response
  • ▶️   ▶️   "Ahaha! I just got the joke!"

Trivia[]

Original Lux
  • ▶️  "With your power level, I suggest you forfeit instead." references It's Over 9000! from Dragon Ball Z.
  • ▶️  "In the name of Demacia, I will punish you!" references Sailor Moon.
  • ▶️  "I love it when a plan comes together." references John 'Hannibal' Smith from The A-Team.
    • A side-by-side comparison can be seen here.
  • ▶️  "Light mage? I'm just an ordinary mage." and ▶️  "I never think about losing." reference Marisa Kirisame from Touhou Project.
  • ▶️  "Shhh! I'm charging my laser... " references Shoop Da Whoop.
  • In the Polish localization, "Light? I carry it in myself." references 'Light, you carry it in yourself'.
Lux, the Lady of Luminosity
  • ▶️  "Double rainbow? What does it mean...?" and ▶️  "Well, a 'double rainbow' is a phenomenon of optics that displays a spectrum of light due to the sun shining on droplets of moisture in the atmosphere. Does that explain it?" reference Yosemitebear62's video.
  • ▶️  "Home is where the spark is." references the proverb 'Home is where the heart is.'
  • ▶️  "We all shine on—like a diamond." references the song Shine On You Crazy Diamond by Pink Floyd.
  • ▶️  "You brought the sun to a light fight?! That... was... probably a good choice, actually... " references The Untouchables ("Isn't that just like a wop? Brings a knife to a gun fight").
  • ▶️  "Are we supposed to be... dating... or something? We've never even talked." references their implied relationship in Lyte's remark toward's Ezreal: ▶️  "Is it true what I've heard about you and Miss Crownguard... hmm?"
Elementalist Lux

Each form features lines for elementally-related champions and/or skins.

  • ▶️  "Rage against the dying of the light." references the line Do not go gentle into that good night by poet Dylan Thomas.
  • ▶️  "You're out of your element!" references The Big Lebowski ("Forget it, Donny, you're out of your element!").
Dark Lux
  • ▶️  "The horror! The horror!" references Heart of Darkness by Joseph Conrad.
  • ▶️  "I didn't choose this form, this form chose me." references I Didn't Choose The Thug Life, The Thug Life Chose Me.
  • ▶️  "Everyone has a dark side." references Charles Marlow.
  • ▶️  "What you don't see can hurt you." references the proverb 'What you don't know can't hurt you.'
  • ▶️  "How much more dark could it be? None. None more dark." references This Is Spinal Tap ("It's like, how much more black could this be? And the answer is none. None more black.").
Air Lux
  • ▶️  "Let the wind carry me." references the song Let the Wind Carry Me by Joni Mitchell.
  • ▶️  "I wander where I will." may reference the song I Will Wander from The Features.
  • ▶️  "Not a cloud in the sky." references the song Not A Cloud In The Sky by John Bucchino.
  • ▶️  "No gust, no glory." references the album No Guts...No Glory from Molly Hatchet.
  • ▶️  "Like chaff before the wind." and ▶️  "Like dust before the wind." references Psalm 35:5.
Storm Lux
  • ▶️  "Ride the lightning." references the titular album by Metallica.
  • ▶️  "Wanna see a perfect storm?" could be referencing the 1991 Perfect Storm.
Fire Lux
  • ▶️  "Am I the only one warding?!" and ▶️  "Ugh! If no one else will." reference supports conceptualized as the only player that should ward.
  • ▶️  "I'm the new hotness!" references Men in Black II ("Old and busted, new hotness.").
  • Fire Lux and Brand share the quote ▶️   / ▶️   "Is it hot in here or is it just me?"
    (resembles ▶️   "Is it cold in here or is it just me?")
  • ▶️  "If you can't stand the heat, stay out of the flame." references the proverb 'If you can't stand the heat, get out of the kitchen.'
  • ▶️  "Only you can prevent forest fires." references the Smokey Bear slogan.
Magma Lux
  • ▶️  "There's fire in my veins, but my heart is hard as stone." might be referencing the songs Fire in My Veins and Heart of Stone.
Nature Lux
  • ▶️  "Learn to bend and not break." references the song Bend And Not Break from Dashboard Confessional.
  • ▶️  "Life finds a way." references the same line from Jurassic Park (film).
  • This form shares voicelines with:
    • ▶️   ▶️   "Look what you made me do!"
  • ▶️  "When the bough breaks, a champion will fall." references the famous nursery rhyme.
Mystic Lux
  • ▶️  "A dream to some, a nightmare to others." references the same line from Excalibur (film).
  • ▶️  "Float like a butterfly." references half of the line from Muhammad Ali ("Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee.").
Water Lux
  • ▶️  "Quake before the deluge." references the song Before The Deluge by Jackson Browne.
Ice Lux
  • ▶️  "Why does everyone always assume I have Turkish delight?" references Jadis from The Chronicles of Narnia by C. S. Lewis.
  • ▶️  "Ice pierces the most temperamental of hearts." might be referencing The Snow Queen by Hans Christian Andersen.
  • ▶️  "Cold doesn't bother me anymore." may be referencing Elsa from Frozen (2013).
Cosmic Lux
  • ▶️  " Xerath; such a dark fate for one who once shined so bright. I will set you free." refers to ▶️  "I will be free."
Dark Cosmic Lux
  • ▶️  "The cosmic court left you for dead, Mordekaiser. Return, and remind them why they fear." refers to ▶️  "The world has tried to forget my existence, time to remind them why they fear".
  • ▶️  "I've been hiding my darkness long enough." refers to ▶️  "I've been hiding my light long enough."
  • ▶️  "I've obliterated galaxies with a thought. You... who are you again?" is similar to ▶️  "Who were you again?"
  • ▶️  "Darkness devours!" is similar to ▶️   "The dark devours all."
  • ▶️  "Gaze into the abyss, and rejoice." is similar to ▶️  "Into the abyss."
  • ▶️  "In the darkness, away from the false glamour of light, the truth stands unmasked and free." is similar to ▶️   "In darkness one's true nature stands revealed."
